Translations.Text: O prophet tell tuus uxor tuus filia uxor believers ut they lengthen their garments. Sic they recognized (prout righteous femina) avoid insulted DEUS est Forgiver Merciful
hypocrites those morbus their hearts vicious liars oppidum refrain (ex persecuting vos) nos surely grant vos superior manus tunc they forced sinister short dum
(They incurred condemnation wherever they iit; they stop attacking vos) they taken killed
Hoc est deus eternal system vos invenit deus system est unchangeable
people ask vos Hora (finis saeculum). Dictus knowledge thereof est unus DEUS! totus vos know Hora est clausum
DEUS condemned disbelievers prepared them Hell
Eternally they abide therein. They non invenit dominus nor supporter
Feria they thrown Hell they dictus Oh nos wish nos obeyed DEUS obeyed messenger
They alias dictus Noster Dominus nos obeyed noster magister dux they led nos astray
Noster Dominus dedit them double retribution curse them tremendous curse
